TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program Enhanced Edition - Release Date Announcement

Articles.Content:
Would some one with experience in the bugtracker please read throu my reports and could tell me if i can keep on doing so? Yes i read the guidline but im Not a nativ speaker and the last thing i want to Do is puting stones in the way of the bugfixingcrew. It's the Same Name as here

Edited January 22, 2018 by PrvDancer85

2 hours ago, Agarwel said:

btw - I just noticed I can use "Recover vessel" even in space or other planes that are otherwise stuck on orbit. Is this a bug or feature?

I mean Im glad that Jeb is back hope from moon where he smashed motors. But it just feels strange :-D

its a bug, its yet another bug that screws career mode over to the point you wonder if it was actually tested
